api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: To access models on Instill Cloud, enter your Instill Cloud API Token. You can find your tokens by visiting your Instill Cloud's Settings > API Tokens page. Leave this field empty to access models on your local Instill Model.

server_url.title: Server URL
server_url.description: Base URL for the Instill Model API. To access models on Instill Cloud, use the base URL `https://api-model.instill.tech`. To access models on your local Instill Model, use the base URL `http://localhost:9080`.
